summary: iOS is the operating system used in Apple's iPhones and other devices. It was first introduced in 2007 and has since become one of the most popular mobile OS worldwide, second only to Android. Major updates are released yearly, with the latest version being iOS 18. This system is based on macOS and is designed to work seamlessly with Apple's hardware. While some parts of its code are open source, iOS is mostly proprietary software.
title: IOS
